name: Sora (prototype)
description:
This was made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #3, so it's not very polished let alone finished. ( I do plan on working on this some more).

You play as Sora a girl gifted by a "Goddess".  She has the ability to manipulate time moving almost instantaneously from place to place and she also has the ability to control the wind through her gohei.  She's part of a group of "magical" girls picked to protect the world from otherworldly dangers.
